quotes.quote: Thrift is poetic because it is creative; waste is unpoetic because it is waste.
The most wasted day of all is that on which we have not laughed.
If it doesn't add value, it's waste.
Waste your money and you're only out of money, but waste your time and you've lost a part of your life.
Waste is only waste if we waste it.
Nothing is a bigger waste of time than regretting the past and worrying about the future
The waste of plenty is the resource of scarcity.
You hang out with trash and you start to smell like garbage.
Do not make your mind a dumping ground for other people's garbage.
Of all the waste we generate, plastic bags are perhaps the greatest symbol of our throwaway society. They are used, then forgotten, and they leave a terrible legacy.
Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
Almost every man wastes part of his life attempting to display qualities which he does not possess.
Don't waste your life believing you can't.
Just because people throw it out and don't have any use for it, doesn't mean it's garbage.
Garbage, in its "worthless" state, is the primary fuel for creativity.
One man's toxic waste is another man's potpourri.
The first draft of anything is garbage.
When plastic comes of age it shall clog the arteries of those who invented it.
To gain the treasure, you must leave the trash.
Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
Waste is worse than loss. The time is coming when every person who lays claim to ability will keep the question of waste before him constantly. The scope of thrift is limitless.
Take time for all things: great haste makes great waste.
Just because you're trash doesn't mean you can't do great things. It is called garbage can, not garbage cannot.
Don't waste your life dreaming of a better one.
Thank God men cannot fly, and lay waste the sky as well as the earth.
There is no such thing as garbage, just useful stuff in the wrong place.

Time waste differs from material waste in that there can be no salvage. The easiest of all wastes and the hardest to correct is the waste of time, because wasted time does not litter the floor like wasted material.
Nothing is a waste of time if you use the experience wisely.
Hundreds would never have known want if they had not at first known waste.
The waste products in Earth's crust are also the human in this expanded, spectral sense. One's garbage doesn't go 'away' - it just goes somewhere else.
